abstract: Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, referring to the Obama administration’s defense of its health care law against the legal challenge from some Catholic nuns, said “If you’re litigating against nuns” then “you’re probably doing something wrong.”

headline.main: Cruz Applause Line Draws Response from High Profile Nun
